text: Daniel Kirkwood (born Edinburgh, Scotland; 28 May 1867 - 23 December 1928) was a former football player, director, and chairman (during the 1909-10 season) of Everton. ==External links== *Daniel Kirkwood - The Director Years *Daniel Kirkwood - Footballer and Director Category:Everton F.C. players Category:English football chairmen and investors Category:Everton F.C. directors and chairmen Category:Footballers from Edinburgh Category:1867 births Category:1928 deaths Category:Association footballers not categorized by position Category:Scottish footballers
title: Daniel Kirkwood (footballer, born 1867)
